diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Ethnobotany.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    Ethnobotany[Ethnobotany] --> Field1[Anthropology]
    Ethnobotany --> Field2[Botany]
    Ethnobotany --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    anthropology --> anthropologySub1[Theory]
    anthropology --> anthropologySub2[Practice]
    botany --> botanySub1[Theory]
    botany --> botanySub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
